message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I believe I can offer you $120 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit to $140. I believe this price reflects the true value of the item.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to offer $130 for the product.
